thread.title: Two-day science fair ends at Chandpur Medical College | News
thread.title_full: Two-day science fair ends at Chandpur Medical College | News

author: BSS
title: Two-day science fair ends at Chandpur Medical College | News
text:
CHANDPUR, Sept 18, 2025 (BSS) - A two-day science conference and science fair has concluded at Chandpur Medical College to develop the talent of students and showcase their innovations.
The closing ceremony was organized at Chandpur Government General Hospital on Wednesday afternoon in a pleasant atmosphere.
On the occasion, teachers presented various topics scheduled in the scientific conference. Students from all departments of the college were present.
College principal Prof Dr Sahela Nazneen presided over the function. Vice-principal Dr Harun Or Rashid, Chandpur Government General Hospital's superintendent Dr AKM Mahbubur Rahman, and head of the college's pathology department Prof Dr Mizanur Rahman, among others, addressed the event.
In her speech, the principal said that each presentation of the students under the supervision of the teachers at the fair was excellent.
Certificates were given to 22 supervisors and 110 students of the 22 stalls participating in the fair. In addition, 12 teachers who participated in the scientific conference were awarded mementos and certificates.
